评论详情: I thought the use of the term "slip on" meant the shoe could be slipped on hands free.  That's not the case.That being said, these are the most comfortable shoes EVER.  It is a happy accident that I found them.

I work from home so I have these on my feet all day long. I have a sit stand desk and I probably stand about five hours. My back feels much better with a zero drop shoe.  I want to re-order them, but they haven’t carried the color I want for a while. I hope they don’t stop manufacturing them!
I love the ease of putting on these shoes. Very comfortable to wear
I love these. They are breathable and comfortable with or without socks.
thank you

I found this shoe by mistake. Best mistake I ever made. It covers your foot like a warm sock. It has a good non slip sole. I have slept in mine because they are warm. I can wear them all day. Amazon needs to find more like these.  I just placed my 3rd order for different color.
Extremely comfortable and very attractive. No problems. Glad it is washable. It will get a lot of use.
Color was alot darker then was shown. I bought the mixed black and wanted a lighter color so according to the picture I ordered the dark grey. disappointed on!y  a shade lighter then mixed black.

Soooo comfortable! I bought them 4 months ago and was waiting for cooler weather to wear them. Started wearing them last week and they are my go to shoe now. I have extra wide feet. My little toes are always swashed in shoes. Not these. They can be slippery on certain surfaces. Otherwise I love them.
These shoes are so comfortable for feet with nerve pain. They offer flexibility and mild support that lessens the pain and tingling when walking.
ive had these a few yrs. look and feel great.

Sometimes my neuropathy gives me so much pain that regular shoes can really hurt my feet. The mesh and softness of these shoes have really made a difference in the versatility of not having to worry about if I will slip and fall. Love the product.

评论概述: These barefoot shoes are very well made!
评论详情: Love the comfort, flexibility, and quality! The materials are holding up great as I’m wearing them 8-10 hours a day, 7 days a week walking, gardening, digging with a shovel, occasional running, jumping, and walking through mud, rain, and wet grass. The mesh material on the top part of the shoe is very durable and pretty strong. The shoes have been machined washed and dried 5-6 times during the 6 weeks that I’ve had them. Love that they can easily be washed! My feet are enjoying the flexibility and freedom of movement allowed by these shoes. Thanks for a great product! Will purchase again!

I really like these shoes. They have just enough support and are lightweight enough to feel like I don’t have much on my feet. The soles are good protection for walking outside as well but I tend to stay inside with them. I plan to take them when I travel. I got the dark gray ones but really wanted the lighter gray but they were out of those. These are okay color wise but would like lighter ones.
Hard to find cute flats. These are perfect
They are comfortable,but with my neopathy I have a lot of pain. Can wear them for a while and change to a different shoe. Otherwise they are great.

评论概述: LOVE these. Like socks with a sole.
评论详情: Durable, flexible, comfortable. Good for everything from Yoga (really good grip, but without being bulky) to hiking (can feel the contour of the ground, but no sharp edges), to every day wear. LOVE these! The shape of bumps on the sole make for a good foot massage all day long. Good arches support too, even though soo light weight. Getting a pair for dancing too - will treat the bottoms with suede to allow more slipperyness.
Nice style. Hope they don’t stretch out too much

评论概述: I do really like these shoes But
评论详情: If you are up in age as I am these shoes have NO cushion at all! BUT I did add an insole and they are amazing! Just not sure worth the money and you also have to purchase insoles. But I am happy with them NOW.

评论概述: Very comfortable, but no grip on wet surfaces
评论详情: I've had these for nearly 5 months now, and I can say I've worn them almost every day since. They are comfortable, and have enough room for my toes. Easy to slip on. And they look normal, I've seen many other barefoot shoes that remind me of clown shoes. Giving 4 stars because wearing these can be dangerous. The sole has absolutely zero grip on any wet floor/surface, feels like walking on ice. Luckily for me I live where we don't get a lot of rain so I haven't slipped yet, but I do have to be super careful. I bought my usual size 6, but it's a little loose. It'll have to do since they don't have any smaller sizes.
I love these shoes, so much so that I bought another pair. No break-in period, just put them on and go!

This is my second pair of these shoes. While they do not have a lot of support if you are on your feet a lot, otherwise they are extremely comfortable. They fit true to size and they don't squeeze your toes. They are not waterproof at all so best give these a miss on rainy days
This is a comfortable shoe, but it runs long and narrow.

Bought a pair of 9's in Brown. I'm 8.5 with narrow feet and high arches. Nothing fits... I mean nothing, w/o extra inserts, whatever. I buy shoes and other ugly sneaker types and the occasional decent looking odd boot/shoe that miraculously don't kill my feet in 2 days, and put in some great soft liners that have helped me for a few years. (get those here btw... if you suffer from PT you know what I'm talking about.  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07D5Y9RWQ/ref=ox_sc_saved_title_4?smid=AORVBCIW4J0PV&psc=1 The liners are a silly bright yellow and blue but they are also in grey... about $1 more. Thankful for them no matter what they look like, because I can't walk in anything w/o them, so I buy shoes/boots a half size larger (9) and that works just fine.  So... back to THESE shoes. I fully expected to have to send them back like most stuff I buy for my little princess twinkle toes ... but from the moment I put them on with the inserts (socks were those knee high thin compression things) - I have only taken them off to sleep! Well yeah, shower.... but I barely even know I'm wearing them. Only one other pair of shoes has been almost this good and Clark doesn't make them anymore. :( Pity. But these guys are amazing for flexibility but still offering support. Love the knubs on the bottom for secure footing. (lol not the best for dancing, so you'll just have to lift up your feet) ;)  Anyway, the years of PF that I managed to mostly eradicate a few months ago came back the other day with a vengeance. IDK, some pair of padded sandals did that, that I bought from Beall's and had to return. So I went back to using the astym tool, etc. to work out what was going on. (Look that up... you need that if you have PF.) But I put these KBZone shoes on and wham... nothing... nada... zip. Pain free. Buying at least another pair. Wish I could find some nice, sharp looking pair of boots or shoes that fit like this and don't actually look like a fat Platypus tail but hey IDC... they do the job. That's my story and I'm sticking to it. :D
Runs very small, not true to size. Can't wear them unfortunately. The ankle part where you slip your foot through was the problem for me.
True to size and not rubbing or blisters

评论概述: wide toebox, comfy with just enough sole
评论详情: I had ordered a few minimalist wide toebox shoes with driving shoe type soles...this one is the best for me, toebox is sufficiently wide (the Mashland ones weren't), the sole seems to fit my foot very comfortably in a minimal but supported way.  They look great and feel great, just ordered two more colors.
I bought these for my daughter.  She absolutely loves them.  Says they are like walking on clouds.  Very happy with this purchase.
The color the fit.

I like the color brown and how they feel and look on my feet. They are true to size and fits comfortable to walk around in. I also wore them to chair yoga and they were comfortable during all the techniques. I wear a size 9B/M, and I love the round wide toe fit. They are so comfortable I ordered another pair in black that will go with most my casual clothes.

I didn't like the narrow opening with a high lip. If it were cut down, sliding in and out would make this wonderful shoe/slipper easier to get on. I'm guessing this pair will last me forever. Very well made.
Very comfortable and easy to put on and take off.
Way to tight.
Love these shoes so much I bought a second pair in black.
A little tough to get on but very comfy
I was not sure if I would like these shoes, but they are comfortable, look good with dressy clothes as well casual. The bottom of the shoes concerned me, but they are fine.

I love these shoes for winter indoor wear. They are comfortable and padded inside on the sole. Outside stretch material is giving and comfortable while the sole is solid and protective. I like them so much I’m ordering another pair. Sad there aren’t more colors.
I wore them right out of the box and they were comfortable. I think the color is great and I will wear them often.

评论概述: The foam on the inner sole is very thin
评论详情: The shoes are fit pretty comfortable, the top is super soft, and love the rubber bottom. However, the foam on the inner sole is very thin, it feels much better after I added a thin from cushion. But for the price, I am happy with this product.
Very comfortable and a little challenging to get on, but I love them.

I ordered and promptly returned five other pairs of slippers before coming across these "sock shoes." As slippers, they are super comfortable and tasteful. These shoes are super comfortable. They’re like wearing socks with soles. I did find that in the rain they can be a little slippery though, so be aware of that.  If you need structure for your foot, these are not for you. These are for lounging around the house or for  in formalwear.
Very happy with these for the price. They are comfy and very lightweight. Perfect for work and being on my feet all day. Will be getting more colors!

评论概述: Need a wide toe box shoe? You found it!
评论详情: I bought these for a trip I took to Scotland. I knew I was going to be walking a lot and needed something comfortable. These did not disappoint! They were sooo comfortable. I’ve got some wicked bunions so I was looking for a wide toe box shoe that didn’t look ugly. I can’t even begin to explain all the walking I did WITHOUT pain. Amazing for me! If you need a wide toe box shoe with some support and don’t want to spend $200, this is your shoe! And they looked nice too! (Buying other colors now)!

I've worn nothing but these shoes to work as a teacher since I got them a week ago. They're super comfortable, and lightweight. I've already bought them in a second color because they're all I want to wear. Be aware that although I find them very easy to slip on and off, my mother who has high insteps could not get them on her feet at all (the opening was too small even though she normally wears a 1/2 size smaller than I do).  I usually add an over the counter insole to most shoes to make them more comfortable, but these are much more comfortable without it!  Will probably be back for even more colors.  Note: the "mix black" is a very dark gray. I wear them with black pants and they look good and do not stand out.
Like the comfort and did add additional insert for more cushion for heel.  Feel like slippers. I am very happy with purchase. So far, bought 3 pairs!
all great features about this product

These shoes are perfect and so comfortable. They feel almost like slippers, with no constriction. Due to this, they are not good for hiking or running, anything that moves the shoes around easily. I adore these bootie sneakers, they are my go to shoe. They are comfortable and light weight. I also have them in brown!
I love these shoes, wish I could afford one in every color. My feet are not in the best condition with bunions and corns, these are so comfortable.

These are wonderful slippers or even to go outside.  It took a year to finally find a slipper that doesn't cause my flat feet or knees to feel pain or discomfort.  They are great will certainly buy again, true to size fit.

Happy feet! I ordered my first pair of barefoot shoes and was surprised how comfortable they are. I thought they would look funny but I actually like the look and don't mind wearing them with shorts. The blue is also a very pretty shade. I have long, skinny feet and ordering online is always iffy. These could have been a half size down but they don't offer half sizes. I'm a farmer and walk on varied terrains, the insoles are thick enough for gravel roads and the nubby soles are not slippery on any surface here.

评论概述: Just What I Was Looking For!
评论详情: I finally found a pair of dark brown "sock shoes" with a brown (actually tan) sole--not a white sole!!! The shoes fit true to size and are extremely comfortable. I prefer to wear an ankle sock when walking and these shoes will accommodate thick ones or thin ones.
Wearing these are so comfortable. I am thinking about getting other colors.

I have really bad feet. No arches and dance injuries have made it so that they are just chronically injured. I purchased these as my ADHD house task shoes, and have really tried to dig deep into the benefit of the shoes. My physical therapist encourages me to wear them often as I work to retrain my muscles to behave as if I had arches in my feet. THESE HELP WITH THAT!
Size 6 was a little large for me without socks. Too bad it does not come in any size smaller. Sole is comfortable. Inside fabric is reasonably comfortable, without scratchy or pokey parts
Love my new sock shoes.  There are bubbles on the shoal that make me feel as if I am getting a massage.
These have to be the most comfortable shoes I've ever had.  They are well made and look nice on.
These are so comfortable; I wear them everywhere.

While in the bag that they came in, they looked somewhat unremarkable. But get them on my feet, and I’m completely sold! They fit like gloves for feet. They don’t look or wear like a slipper at all, like a lot of sock shoes do. These are definitely shoes with just enough stretch to hug the feet but not so much as to be more sock than shoe. Yet the material is thick and seems tough enough for everyday wear. I am sure that the more inconspicuous colors of these could be worn in a business casual setting without eyebrows being raised, especially those with a dark sole. I’ve worn the pair I have for a couple of days and the only thing about these that I will be fixing is the inserts. The ones they come with are a little too foam-like and they feel like they’re sticking to my feet, nearly coming out when I take the shoes off. Foot powder helps but I will be getter better inserts, and this why I gave them 4 stars instead of 5. Overall I love these and have come back for more.
They are lightweight, comfortable and have great traction.  Within two days, I ordered another pair in a different color.  I do wish there were more lighter colored options though.
